# 9.0 Docs

- [.NET Monitor images simplified to version-only tags](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/9.0/monitor-images.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where the .NET Monitor 9 image offering has been simplified to only provide Azure Linux distroless images.
- [.NET 9 container images no longer install `zlib`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/9.0/no-zlib.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where .NET 9 container images no longer install the zlib package.
